evolution.name: Ivysaur
evolution.methodExplanation: Evolves by leveling up starting at level 16

1-0.moveEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

3-0.moveEffect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

7-0.moveEffect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

9-0.moveEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

15-0.moveEffect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

19-0.moveEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

21-0.moveEffect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.

25-0.moveEffect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

27-0.moveEffect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

31-0.moveEffect: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

33-0.moveEffect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

37-0.moveEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

TM 6.moveEffect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

TM 9.moveEffect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

TM 10.moveEffect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

TM 11.moveEffect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

TM 16.moveEffect: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.

TM 17.moveEffect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

TM 20.moveEffect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

TM 21.moveEffect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

TM 22.moveEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

TM 27.moveEffect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

TM 32.moveEffect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

TM 36.moveEffect: Has a 30% chance to Poison the target.

TM 42.moveEffect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

TM 44.moveEffect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

TM 45.moveEffect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

TM 48.moveEffect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

TM 49.moveEffect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

TM 53.moveEffect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

TM 70.moveEffect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

TM 75.moveEffect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

TM 86.moveEffect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

TM 87.moveEffect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

TM 88.moveEffect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

TM 90.moveEffect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

TM 94.moveEffect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

TM 96.moveEffect: Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.

TM 100.moveEffect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

TM 101.moveEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

TM 104.moveEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

TM 106.moveEffect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

eggMoves.moveEffect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
Has a 30% chance to Poison the target.
Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.
Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.
Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.
Prevents the user from leaving battle.  User regains 1/16 of its max HP every turn.
Puts the target to sleep.
Never misses.
Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their Grass moves to 1.5× their power.

tutorMoves.moveEffect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.
Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.
Target drops its held item.
Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.
Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
